## Not type

Not operator for types.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type Not<T> = If<IsFalsy<T>, true, false>
```
**References:** [If](./types-kit.if.md)<!-- -->, [IsFalsy](./types-kit.isfalsy.md)

## Example


```ts
 // Expect: false
 type Foo = Not<true>
 // Expect: true
 type Bar = Not<false>
```
